title: Quarantine Choice Awards, Bloomberg Pays for Friends 2.24.20
itunes:title: Quarantine Choice Awards, Bloomberg Pays for Friends 2.24.20
description:
In episode 575, Jack and special guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by Get Rich Nicks and Deckheads podcast co-host Nick Turner to discuss Trump clouding the Russian election meddling discussion, Mike Bloomberg's Instagram meme campaign, how the REAL ID is connected to Trump's border wall, the 2020 White House Correspondents Dinner, a study about dog owners, the coronavirus, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump Names Richard Grenell as Acting Head of Intelligence
  2. 8 U.S. Intelligence Groups Blame Russia for Meddling, but Trump Keeps Clouding the Picture
  3. Bernie Sanders on Bloomberg debate performance: "I think it's quite likely that Trump will chew him up and spit him out."
  4. How Bloomberg Bungled a Debate That He Had Been Prepped For
  5. Bloomberg hired Fyre Festival promoters to make his campaign memes
  6. BLOOMBERG PLAGIARIZED PARTS OF AT LEAST EIGHT OF HIS PLANS
  7. Michael Bloomberg’s Campaign Suddenly Drops Memes Everywhere
  8. Mike Bloomberg Is Paying ‘Influencers’ to Make Him Seem Cool
  9. Mike Bloomberg is paying people to send their friends texts about him
  10. Meet the developer that's making apps for the conservative movement
  11. It Looks Like the Trump Campaign’s App Will Track Users’ Locations. Is That Normal?
  12. Trump Administration to Waive Contracting Laws to Speed Border Wall Construction
  13. REAL ID ACT SHOULD BE REPEALED, NOT “FIXED”
  14. THE LITTLE-KNOWN LAW THAT THE TRUMP ADMINISTRATION IS USING TO BUILD A BORDER WALL
  15. Air Travelers Must Have REAL ID-Compliant Driver’s Licenses by October 2020
  16. Trump Is Blowing Up Native Burial Grounds to Build His Wall
  17. Native American tribe says Pentagon failed to consult on border wall construction
  18. Kenan Thompson to host 2020 White House Correspondents' Dinner
  19. Study: Dog owners take more photos of their pet than spouse, family
  20. Diamond Princess ordeal ends for passengers who tested negative for COVID-19
  21. Updates on Diamond Princess
  22. WATCH: DHL - Frank Ocean

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
